about_the_game:
RevenBlade features primarily melee-focused combat with abilities that are focused on getting up close to enemies.



Mobility is at the forefront of RevenBlade gameplay. Dashing, climbing, sliding, hovering, and more all give characters tons of outplay potential and depth to character mastery. Each map is also carefully designed with verticality in mind which allows you to flank and dive your opponents not just from the sides, but also from above and below.



Work together with four teammates to control Towers, allowing you to destroy and take over enemy Crystals as your own. Coordinate your efforts into a single place, or split up to contest Shard points and look for the flanking opportunities that could turn a lost objective into a massive win.

Instead of having an overly complicated shop, RevenBlade's Upgrade and Augment system allows you to level-up your abilities and choose up to four of a collection of Augments hand-tailored for each character. These Augments give bonus effects, buffs, or alterations to each ability, making them fit the specific needs of your team composition or counter enemy strategies.

content_descriptors.notes: RevenBlade contains stylized violence/fighting between players. The violence includes subtle stylized blood effects and death but no gore.
